details.title: Order Details
details.depositAddressInfo: ðŸ’¡ Send ckUSDC to the complete address above (principal.subaccount format). The canister manages these funds and processes fees, refunds, and filler payments automatically for this specific order.
details.idleChunkWarningSingular: {{count}} chunk is currently idle (not in orderbook)
details.idleChunksWarningPlural: {{count}} chunks are currently idle (not in orderbook)
details.idleChunksInfo: BSV price is above your max price of ${{price}}. To list {{target}} again, increase your max price above the current market rate.
details.sendRemainingAmount: Please send the remaining amount using one of the funding options below.
details.enterValidPrice: Please enter a valid positive price
details.feeInfoMaker: ðŸ’¡ Maker Fee: {{totalFee}}% ({{activationFee}}% activation fee + {{fillerIncentive}}% filler incentive). This covers platform operations and incentivizes traders to fill your order quickly.
details.chunksLockedWarning: {{count}} chunk{{s}} currently locked in active trade{{s}} - trader{{s}} must complete {{possessive}} transaction{{s}} first
details.availableChunkInfoSingular: {{count}} chunk is ready for traders to fill
details.availableChunksInfoPlural: {{count}} chunks are ready for traders to fill

funding.sendOnEthereum: Send on Ethereum Mainnet to the address above
funding.autoConvertInfo: ðŸ’¡ Send USDC on Ethereum Mainnet to this address. It will be automatically converted to ckUSDC on the Internet Computer for your order.

refund.fundedOrderDesc: This will refund all unfilled portions of your order. Filled and locked portions cannot be refunded.
refund.unfundedOrderDesc: This will permanently remove your order. No funds have been deposited yet.
refund.noFundsTransferred: No funds were transferred to this order. Canceling will simply remove it.
refund.activationFeeExplanation: Activation fee of {{amount}} USDC ({{percent}}%) is non-refundable
